objective.title: Sophisticated Rule Orchestration Platform - Architecture & Core Components
objective.description: Implement enhanced manage_rule() MCP tool with nested rule loading, client integration, and advanced rule composition capabilities

custom_requirements:
Transform the basic manage_rule MCP tool into a sophisticated rule orchestration platform supporting:

**Core Enhancements:**
- Nested rule hierarchy loading and management
- JSON/MDC content parsing and validation  
- Client-side rule synchronization
- Dynamic rule composition and conflict resolution
- Performance optimization with intelligent caching
- Integration with existing Phase 2 compliance systems

**Technical Architecture:**
- RuleContentParser: Handle JSON/MDC parsing
- NestedRuleManager: Navigate hierarchical structures
- ClientRuleIntegrator: Enable client communication
- RuleComposer: Intelligent rule combination
- RuleCacheManager: Performance optimization
- Enhanced MCP tool with new actions

**Integration Requirements:**
- Maintain Phase 2 compliance compatibility
- Integrate with document validation system
- Support existing timeout and monitoring features
- Preserve backward compatibility with current actions
